textContent:
---learning more about you---

I'm writing this right after I got home from retrieving the car from Toyota. I've window shopped at the mall while waiting for the car and while doing so, all that's going inside my mind were thoughts like:

"Alin kaya sa mga librong to yung gusto ni Rei?"

"Gusto kaya ni Rei yung gantong damit?"

"Ano kaya sa mga to yung pipiliing kainin ni Rei kung kasama ko siya ngayon?"

That's when I realized: I really do not know much about you. After all my talk about memorizing your whole being, I realize I do not even know which books you have read, what books you want to read, what dresses your prefer, what clothes you avoid, and many more things. 

I was faced with the sad reality that we really have only been talking for a little over three weeks. That I really do not know much about you, Rei. 

But at the same time, within those three weeks, we've also learned a lot abou each other. I might say I know more about you compared to classmates I've known for years. Moreover, I am excited to know more about you, just as I am sure you want to know more abou me. I'm excited for the day where we know each other long enough and hard enough that I can really proudly say that I really do know you. And I'll do everything I can so that we get to see that day. I miss you Babycakes!! I hope you're sleeping well while I'm writing this.

---mga titolo ni rei---

Rei Ina Romero, Alindog ng Malino, Kamandag ng Buhay ko.

She Who Can Make Me Weep. For Her The Stars, I'll Sweep.

The Bane of My Existence. My Most Loved Presence.
title: January 24, 2024
textContentHtml:
---learning more about you---

That's when I realized: I really do not know much about you. After all my talk about memorizing your whole being, I realize I do not even know which books you have read, what books you want to read, what dresses your prefer, what clothes you avoid, and many more things.

Moreover, I am excited to know more about you, just as I am sure you want to know more abou me.
